text: jin logon ne kuphr ikhteyaar kiya un ke liye duniya kee zara see zindagee khoob achchhee dikhaayee gayee hai aur eemaanadaaron se masakharaapan karate hain haaloki qayaamat ke din parahezagaaron ka daraja unase (kaheen) badh chadh ke hoga aur khuda jis ko chaahata hai be hisaab rozee ata pharamaata hai
